title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Independents and anarchists coordinated their activities.”

[From NPR around 8:20 AM (EDT) September 1, 2004, during a discussion of protesters' doings at the Republican National Convention. Submitted by Ed Rosenberg, who adds, “I guess they just don't make anarchists the way they used to.”]
